title: France panorama. [No. 73/11]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Peace conference - the Vietnam Peace Conference in Paris. 2. In the news: For men - men’s fashions by Pierre Cardin. Variations on Venus - humor and art, or the dangers of celebrity. 3. Preserving the past - at St Germaine-en-Laye, a campaign to preserve past glories. 4. The arts: Portrait of a collector - Marcel Lefebvre, oils manufacturer, friend of the painters, and art-collector. Art and scenography - Erte retrospective.
